title: AI-Powered Resume Screening Assistant
description: Develop an AI assistant that screens job resumes, ranks them based on job descriptions, and provides interview suggestions. The tool will use LangChain with OpenAI for semantic matching and Flask for a web interface. Integration with a PostgreSQL database will be required for storing parsed resume data and job roles.
role:
Build resume parsing pipeline using NLP
Implement AI matching logic using LangChain + OpenAI
Create web interface using Flask
Design PostgreSQL database schema
Train and evaluate matching models
